data.message: Coke is made, like alcohol, to be enjoyed responsibly. It's great for celebrations, that's why it's known as 'Black Champagne'. And it's great chilled after sports or dancing or just simply refreshing. At present I'm 53, over weight male,107 k, I drink Coke rarely, but have 5 Classic Coke T shirts from ASDA that I wear most days.. I don't think I'll be buying 'hype/Coke' clothes,but I love my Classic Coke Lifestyle. PS Hype don't do my size except 1 shirt XXL.
